snippet: Booby-trapped ammunition has a extensive history, but the practice is controversial, its legality is questionable and governments have rarely disclosed information about programs intended to pass lethal products into others' hands.
abstract: Booby-trapped ammunition has a extensive history, but the practice is controversial, its legality is questionable and governments have rarely disclosed information about programs intended to pass lethal products into others' hands.

headline.main: Dirty Tricks of Government Forces: Where Deception and Deadliness Meet Inside a Gun
